Title: Relates to authorizing free hunting licenses for NYS hunter education instructors
Summary: Authorizes free hunting, fishing and trapping licenses for NYS hunter education instructors with at least five years of service as an instructor.
LawCode: Amd ยง11-0715, En Con L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the environmental conservation law, in relation to authorizing free fishing, hunting, and trapping licenses to New York state hunter education instructors
